question.body: Which of the following is not a characteristic that is shared by both cardiac muscle cells and skeletal muscle cells?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Both of these muscle types use sarcomeres to contract.
Incorrect. Both of these muscle types contain T tubules.
Incorrect. Both of these muscle types require oxygen to produce the energy needed for sustained contractions.
Correct. Only cardiac muscle cells contain intercalated discs for passing electrical signals from one muscle cell to the next.
